  • Method Details

    • callbacks

      public net.tnemc.plugincore.core.api.CallbackManager callbacks()
      The callback manager for the TNE API. This adds an event-style system that is supported across every platform.
      Returns:
      The callback manager that is being used.

    • addHandler

      public void addHandler(HoldingsHandler handler)
      Used to add a new HoldingsHandler to the EconomyManager. These handlers are able to add additional holdings sources for accounts.
      Parameters:
      handler - The handler to add.
      See Also:
      • Handlers Wiki

    • addAccountType

      public void addAccountType(Class<? extends SharedAccount> type, Function<String,Boolean> check)
      Adds an account type represented by the specified class along with a validation function.
      Parameters:
      type - The Class representing the account type, extending SharedAccount.
      check - The validation function that takes a String argument and returns a Boolean. It is used to check if an account of the specified type is valid based on some criteria. The String argument is the account's name.

    • addAccountStatus

      public void addAccountStatus(AccountStatus status)
      Adds an account status to the collection.
      Parameters:
      status - The AccountStatus to be added.

    • hasAccount

      public boolean hasAccount(@NotNull @NotNull String identifier)
      Used to determine if an Account exists with the specified identifier.

      This method is safe to search for non-player accounts.

      Parameters:
      identifier - The string identifier for the account that is being looked for.
      Returns:
      True if an account with the specified identifier exists, otherwise false.
      Since:
      0.1.2.0

    • hasPlayerAccount

      public boolean hasPlayerAccount(@NotNull @NotNull UUID identifier)
      Used to determine if an PlayerAccount exists with the specified identifier.

      This method is not safe to search for non-player accounts.

      Parameters:
      identifier - The identifier for the account that is being looked for.
      Returns:
      True if an account with the specified identifier exists, otherwise false.
      Since:
      0.1.2.0

    • getOrCreateAccount

      public AccountAPIResponse getOrCreateAccount(@NotNull @NotNull String identifier, @NotNull @NotNull String name)
      Looks for an account based on the provided identifier and if none is found, creates it.

      This method could return any of the following account types: - NonPlayerAccount - SharedAccount

      This method is safe to search for non-player accounts.

      Parameters:
      identifier - The string identifier for the account that is being looked for.
      name - The string name for the account that is being looked for.
      Returns:
      The correlating account object if found, otherwise the one created.
      Since:
      0.1.2.0

    • getOrCreatePlayerAccount

      public AccountAPIResponse getOrCreatePlayerAccount(@NotNull @NotNull UUID identifier, @NotNull @NotNull String name)
      Looks for an account based on the provided identifier and if none is found, creates it.

      This method returns an PlayerAccount.

      This method is not safe to search for non-player accounts.

      Parameters:
      identifier - The UUID identifier for the account that is being looked for.
      name - The string name for the account that is being looked for.
      Returns:
      The correlating response.
      Since:
      0.1.2.0

    • createNonPlayerAccount

      public Optional<SharedAccount> createNonPlayerAccount(@NotNull @NotNull String identifier, String name)
      Attempts to create an account with the given identifier. This method returns true if the account was created, otherwise false.

      This method is intended for non-player accounts.

      Parameters:
      identifier - The String identifier for the account that is being created.
      Returns:
      If the account is created an Optional containing the account, or an empty Optional.
      Since:
      0.1.2.0

    • createPlayerAccount

      public AccountAPIResponse createPlayerAccount(@NotNull @NotNull UUID identifier, @NotNull @NotNull String name)
      Attempts to create an account with the given identifier. This method returns true if the account was created, otherwise false.

      This method is not intended for non-player accounts.

      Parameters:
      identifier - The UUID identifier for the account that is being created.
      name - The String representation of the name for the account being created, usually the username of the player.
      Returns:
      The correlating response.
      Since:
      0.1.2.0

    • getAccount

      public Optional<Account> getAccount(@NotNull @NotNull String identifier)
      Looks for an account based on the provided identifier.

      This method could return any of the following account types: - PlayerAccount - NonPlayerAccount - SharedAccount

      This method is safe to search for non-player accounts.

      Parameters:
      identifier - The string identifier for the account that is being looked for.
      Returns:
      An optional containing the Account if found, otherwise an empty optional.
      Since:
      0.1.2.0

    • getPlayerAccount

      public Optional<PlayerAccount> getPlayerAccount(@NotNull @NotNull UUID identifier)
      Looks for an PlayerAccount based on the provided identifier.

      This method is not safe to search for non-player accounts.

      Parameters:
      identifier - The identifier for the account that is being looked for.
      Returns:
      An optional containing the PlayerAccount if found, otherwise an empty optional.
      Since:
      0.1.2.0

    • deleteAccount

      public EconomyResponse deleteAccount(@NotNull @NotNull String identifier, @NotNull @NotNull ActionSource source)
      Used to delete the specified account.

      This method is safe to search for non-player accounts.

      Parameters:
      identifier - The identifier associated with the account that you wish to delete.
      source - The source response for this deletion call.
      Returns:
      The response that should be returned based on the deletion action.
      Since:
      0.1.2.0

    • deleteAccount

      public EconomyResponse deleteAccount(@NotNull @NotNull UUID identifier, @NotNull @NotNull ActionSource source)
      Used to delete the specified account.

      This method is not safe to search for non-player accounts.

      Parameters:
      identifier - The identifier associated with the account that you wish to delete.
      source - The source response for this deletion call.
      Returns:
      The response that should be returned based on the deletion action.
      Since:
      0.1.2.0

      Adds a CurrencyType to the collection.
      Parameters:

    • addCurrency

      public void addCurrency(Currency currency)
      Adds a Currency to the collection.
      Parameters:

    • addBalanceFormatRule

      public void addBalanceFormatRule(FormatRule rule)
      Adds a FormatRule for balance formatting.
      Parameters:
      rule - The FormatRule to be added for balance formatting.

    • getDefaultCurrency

      @NotNull public @NotNull Currency getDefaultCurrency()
      Used to get the default currency. This could be the default currency for the server globally or for the default world if the implementation supports multi-world.
      Returns:
      The currency that is the default for the server if multi-world support is not available otherwise the default for the default world.
      Since:
      0.1.2.0

    • getDefaultCurrency

      @NotNull public @NotNull Currency getDefaultCurrency(@NotNull @NotNull String region)
      Used to get the default currency for the specified world if this implementation has multi-world support, otherwise the default currency for the server.
      Parameters:
      region - The region to get the default currency for. This could be a world, biomes, or a third party based region.
      Returns:
      The default currency for the specified world if this implementation has multi-world support, otherwise the default currency for the server.
      Since:
      0.1.2.0

    • getCurrencies

      public Collection<Currency> getCurrencies()
      Used to get a set of every Currency object for the server.
      Returns:
      A set of every Currency object that is available for the server.
      Since:
      0.1.2.0

    • getCurrencies

      public Collection<Currency> getCurrencies(@NotNull @NotNull String region)
      Used to get a set of every Currency object that is available in the specified world if this implementation has multi-world support, otherwise all Currency objects for the server.
      Parameters:
      region - The region to get the currencies for. This could be a world, biomes, or a third party based region.
      Returns:
      A set of every Currency object that is available in the specified world if this implementation has multi-world support, otherwise all Currency objects for the server.
      Since:
      0.1.2.0

    • getHoldings

      public BigDecimal getHoldings(String identifier, String world, String currency)
      Used to get the holdings of the specified identifier.
      Parameters:
      identifier - The identifier to get the holdings for.
      world - The world to use for getting the holdings.
      currency - The currency to use for getting the holdings
      Returns:
      The holdings in BigDecimal format.

    • hasHoldings

      public boolean hasHoldings(String identifier, String world, String currency, BigDecimal amount)
      Used to check if a specific identifier has an amount of holdings.
      Parameters:
      identifier - The identifier to check the holdings for.
      world - The world to use for the holdings check.
      currency - The currency to use for the holdings check.
      amount - The BigDecimal amount that we need to check if the identifier has.
      Returns:
      True if the specified identifier has the holdings, otherwise false.

    • removeHoldings

      public TransactionResult removeHoldings(String identifier, String world, String currency, BigDecimal amount, String pluginName)
      Used to remove a certain amount of holdings from an identifier.
      Parameters:
      identifier - The identifier to use for the transaction.
      world - The world to use for the transaction.
      currency - The currency to use for the transaction.
      amount - The amount to remove.
      pluginName - The name of the plugin performing this transaction.
      Returns:
      The associated result from the transaction.

    • addHoldings

      public TransactionResult addHoldings(String identifier, String world, String currency, BigDecimal amount, String pluginName)
      Used to add a certain amount of holdings to an identifier.
      Parameters:
      identifier - The identifier to use for the transaction.
      world - The world to use for the transaction.
      currency - The currency to use for the transaction.
      amount - The amount to add.
      pluginName - The name of the plugin performing this transaction.
      Returns:
      The associated result from the transaction.

    • setHoldings

      public boolean setHoldings(String identifier, String world, String currency, BigDecimal amount)
      Used to set the holdings of the specified identifier.
      Parameters:
      identifier - The identifier to set the holdings for.
      world - The world to use for setting the holdings.
      currency - The currency to use for setting the holdings
      Returns:
      True if the transactions was successful, otherwise false.
